What is game ?

It's a simple shooter with a little RPG style.

What is style RPG ?

In Weakness of Darkness they are lot of Orbs magics for your power ! 

Strenght, increase your force power

Magic increase your magic power

Agility increase your agility for dash and increase starship's speed

Armor increase your defenses

But you lucky is beginning for your nightmare, take just one Orb and another power decrease.
